text: there are many effects of bad office
lighting that people don't realize bad
lighting doesn't mean the lack of
lighting it often means that the
Lighting's too bright it can mean that
the lighting has the wrong spectrum and
that can affect your health it can
affect your sleep it can affect your
mood it can affect the health of your
eyes it can cause eye strain that can
disrupt your daily rhythms and the often
means that it impairs the performance of
your work so you make more errors nobody
uses incandescent lights anymore
fluorescent lights are used because
they're more energy-efficient
but even fluorescents are now being
replaced by what are called LEDs light
emitting diodes and you can now have
LEDs that give you different colors
different spectral appearances and you
can put different LEDs together to be
able to tune that the latest lighting
coming out with certain systems you can
actually change the color of your light
from your phone or your tablet using a
simple app that allows you to tune the
light to the needs of the work and also
to simulate time of day so the light
color can change from morning to evening
we can't really do that with
fluorescents and LEDs generally have a
longer life than most fluorescents so
paying for good lighting and great
lighting design is really critical to
great work
